about_the_game:
"

The Return of Dr. Destruction Adventure

Set after the events of Necessary Evil: Invasion the powerful villain Dr. Destruction either died or has long since faded from view. Decades later he's back, but is everything as it appears? It's up to the Doom Guard to find out!
The Return of Dr. Destruction is an adventure for the latest incarnation of Necessary Evil! It acts as a bridge between the original settings and events of
Necessary Evil ,
Necessary Evil: Breakout , and up coming
Necessary Evil: Cosmic Crisis . It also provides context for what happened on Earth in the intervening decade between the previous two stories. "

Necessary Evil: Breakout , and up coming
Necessary Evil: Cosmic Crisis . It also provides context for what happened on Earth in the intervening decade between the previous two stories. "
